scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely a saint, stands in a landscape setting. The figure is depicted with wavy hair, wearing a tunic and a cloak. They hold a chalice with a flame or palm frond emerging from it in their left hand, and their right hand is raised with fingers extended. Behind the figure, stylized trees and rocky terrain are visible. The scene is framed by an architectural element resembling an arch with decorative tracery.
